body.name: HALIDODO 60 Packs Individually Wrapped KN95 Face Mask 5-Ply Breathable & Comfortable Filter Safety Mask with Elastic Ear loop and Nose Bridge Clip, Protective Face Cover Mask, Multi Color
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 19 hrs 21 mins
features: Care and Use: Keep the face mask clean before use. Do not touch the rear side of the face mask. Do not wash the face mask with water. Water will destroy the filtering ability and protective nature of the mask. Do not steam the face mask or put it in the microwave. Make sure to discard the face mask when it becomes visibily ditry or breathing resistance increases remarkably.
Well Wrapped: These individually wrapped kn95 face masks can avoid the pollution caused by touch when taking the mask. Can be perfectly placed in your backpack, purse and pocket.

5-Ply Protection: This KN95 mask is made of 2 non-woven outer layers, 2 melt-blown inner filter, 1 non-woven cotton middle layer, offers more protection than a standard disposable 3-Ply mask. The filter efficiency is 95%, greatly keeping you from dust, PM 2.5, haze, smoke, automobile exhaust, etc.

Comfortable & Breathable: This Large KN95 face mask use skin-friendly non-woven fabric, no irritation to your skin, High-elastic ear loops and adjustable nose clip to ensure a comfortable fit and no strain of ears. It's lightweight and foldable, can cover mouth, nose and chin easily. Creates a tight seal & stops glasses from fogging.
Disclaimer: This KN95 mask is NOT an N95 mask. For more information about KN95 masks please see the following before you purchase: amazon.com/AboutKN95s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No problems. Masks were great and the right kind even 🙂
reviews.reviewText: No problems. Masks were great and the right kind even 🙂Would order again.I got these because my mom has recently become very sick and this is a well function yet comfortable mask. The mask's size it good for me but too big for my wife so if you're smaller than a 5'9" 220lb man then take that into account.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Individually wrapped masks is the best part of these Halidodo masks. Easy to carry a spare or a few that way. Fit is great. Colors are fun. Price is super. Great product and a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ordered box of 60 blue. Was shipped pink, but not sold in pink! Returning
reviews.reviewText: We ordered a whole box of 60 in light blue. Much to our surprise, they were shipped in PINK! 🤢IT IS NOT SOLD IN PINK.🤭Finding the replacement was extremely time consuming but we finally found the blue we originally ordered. Now we wait some more for them to arrive.The KN95 mask takes some getting used to if you are accustomed to cloth or disposable 3 layer masks.I highly recommend wearing for short times, both inside and out till you get accustomed to the tighter fit. It is not easy to work out at the gym with it or do sweaty or heavy breathing walking or hiking. Lotsa talking also takes getting accustomed to. But well worth it for your safety. ⭐⭐⭐⭐In winter weather, they act as a good face & nose warmer in the northern cold. A nice side effect.Important: Don't expect to be able to just stick it on your face and jump on a plane for hours. It is not possible. It is an acquired, slow comfort level and will take time to acclimate. No one tells you this!We love the fact that it gives us room to breathe with no smushing our noses and mouths. The fit is one of the best fits and quality we have found. Very snug for adults, no gaps, comfortable, does not fog glasses as no breath escapes out of the top! Yesss! That makes a good seal.We sincerely hope the replacement masks will be blue and high quality.Will revisit review when we receive the blue masks we originally ordered. At that time, we will do a complete review, including comfort, fit & durability along with our perceived safety including dissection of one after it has been worn out to evaluate fabric & 5 layers. We really hope these are as safe & high quality as the other reviews indicated.A college student teacher friend highly recommended and swears by another KN95 brand sold out of NY state. We are waiting for that order along with this corrected order from Amazon.All good KN95 masks are sealed inside a cellophane wrapper as is this one. Such a great safety feature. Any changes will be posted after we receive correct blue masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great mask to wear. They are very comfortable. I love the choice of colors as well as the solids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy on the ears.
reviews.reviewText: They somehow seemed a bit thinner than other 4-ply masks I have purchased. Of course, merely a guess. However, I will certainly buy these again as they are so very comfortable, in how they fit over the ears. and the cost is very competitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, cheerful KN95 masks--But...
reviews.reviewText: The order arrived quickly and I'm delighted with the vivid colors and the masks themselves.However, my order of 60 masks had only 59 in the box. I am missing one (1) gray mask.I tried to address this online, but had to finally get an agent to address the problem. His Oh-So-Carefully-Explained solution was to replace the whole order--for a $.29 (per piece) item. NO, thank you. So he credited $5 for my next order "as a token of apology."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful colors.Good quantity for the price.Fits well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathable & comfortable mask
reviews.reviewText: Colorful, breathable & comfortable mask also I love how they hold there shape, and individual wrappedKudos 👍🏾
